Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP - Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II - Canon EF 75-300mm f/4
Reviews.Author: R. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera even for a a beginner. Love it! This Canon EOS Rebel T3i comes in a kit and it has everything you would need to take very professional looking photo. You will be so happy to frame your photo... they make great gifts.

Reviews.Title: Great bundle!
Reviews.Author: Benelux2000
Reviews.Content: I love this camera so much!  I never knew how much fun it would be to take pictures!  I am an actress and I wanted to have something to capture every moment!  This is wonderful!  I can practice my monologues, record scenes, and do so much with it!  I can't believe what a steal this product is!  I didn't like the camera bag, but I will get a new one soon.  I wish it just came with a small case for protecting the camera when out, instead of a bag.  Love it though!!!!
